channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-24123] test_dependency.py fails due to 'Failed to close remote bundle'

item.summary: test_dependency.py fails due to 'Failed to close remote bundle'

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Merged into master via fb5d1b84a8faeada0d745204381b519ac689a348
Merged into release-1.14 via d9e6abf83d5187095403532ebbbd01aa6837a556
